articles.author: Daniel Lawler
articles.title: Large asteroid to zoom between Earth and Moon - Phys.org
articles.description: A large asteroid will safely zoom between Earth and the Moon on Saturday, a once-in-a-decade event that will be used as a training exercise for planetary defense efforts, according to the European Space Agency.
